title: Filter Non-Null Email Entries
description: In the outbound component, display only those entries whose email entry is not null.

title: Add Email Count Column
description: Display a column showing the number of emails sent to each email address (fetched from Supabase).

title: Add Email Template Dropdown
description: For each row, provide a dropdown (using shadcn/ui select) to choose an email template (placeholder values: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5).

title: Add Sender Email Dropdown
description: Provide a dropdown to select the sender email ID (placeholder values: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5).

title: Add Send/Draft Mode Selection
description: Add a dropdown to choose between sending the email directly or creating a draft.

title: Implement Send/Draft Functionality
description: If 'Send Directly' is selected, allow scheduling via a date-time picker input or immediate send. If 'Create Draft' is selected, save as draft without sending.
